    • handleEntityCollisions

      public static boolean handleEntityCollisions​(@NonNull User user, @NonNull Collider collider, @NonNull CollisionUtil.CollisionCallback callback, boolean livingOnly, boolean selfCollision, boolean earlyEscape)
      Checks a collider to see if it's hitting any entities near it. By default it ignores Spectators and invisible armor stands.
      Parameters:
      user - the user (needed for self collision and to specify the world in which collisions are checked)
      collider - the collider to check
      callback - the method to be called for every hit entity
      livingOnly - whether only LivingEntities should be checked
      selfCollision - whether the collider can collider with the user
      earlyEscape - if true it will return on the first valid collision callback without evaluating other entities
      Returns:
      true if it hit at least one entity
